info.title: Mocked-API
info.description: An API library for providing endpoints of mock data for use during testing. This API is still in the development and until it reaches version 1.0.0 the API is subject to change. To find out more head over to https://mocked-api.dev/

Note: hex is only available if the color space doesn't include alpha

get.summary: Obtain a random phone number in a random format
Obtain a random phone number based on country code and optional formatting

parameters.name: country code
parameters.description: The 2 letter code of a country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The separator for the phone number 'space', 'nospace', 'dash'
